author: Alok Deshpande
title: Restaurants can stay open for home delivery, says State
description: Shops selling meat, fish, eggs and fruits will also be open
content:
The Maharashtra government on Friday allowed restaurants to re-open kitchens and deliver food to individuals or societies after adhering to prescribed safety norms to protect from the novel coronavirus.
Deputy Chief Minister Ajit Pawar said the decision has … [+1978 chars]
